titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: UMBILICAL CORD BLOOD PARTIAL PRESSURE CARBON DIOXIDE (ARTERIAL) - Description

body.p: UMBILICAL CORD BLOOD PARTIAL PRESSURE CARBON DIOXIDE (ARTERIAL) is the PARTIAL PRESSURE CARBON DIOXIDE of arterial blood taken from the umbilical cord after delivery of the baby.
The value is presented in the range 5.00 - 8.50.
